name: Gluten-Free Pumpkin Bread
author: antally
summary: This recipe for gluten-free pumpkin bread gives you moist loaves that are full of flavor.
ingredients: 1 ¾ cups gluten-free multi-purpose flour (such as Mixoflour)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9x5-inch loaf pan
Mix pumpkin puree, sugar, eggs, oil, and applesauce together in a large bowl
Whisk flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, and ginger together in a separate bowl; add to pumpkin mixture and stir until just blended into a batter
Gently fold raisins through the batter; pour into prepared loaf pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 60 to 70 minutes
Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack
